Token.Abstract: An invoice represents a collection of items and extra charges by a merchant for a customer.
Finds the invoice with the specified PayPal Invoice ID (a guid-like value starting with INV)

Parameter.Name: invoiceId
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The ID of the invoice to fetch from the server. You can acquire an invoice ID from doing a SearchInvoices API call or using one from saving a previous invoice.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: NSManagedObjectContext The context to reconcile the invoice with, nil is you would not like to reconcile at this time.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceLoadCompletionHandler The block to invoke and retuirn the newly created invoice once the load is complete.

Token.Abstract: Finds the invoice with the specified merchant reference number

Parameter.Name: referenceNumber
Parameter.Abstract: the merchant reference number on the invoice

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: NSManagedObjectContext The context to reconcile the invoice with, nil is you would not like to reconcile at this time.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceLoadCompletionHandler The block to invoke and retuirn the newly created invoice once the load is complete.

Token.Abstract: Initialize the invoice with just a currency. The go to way to make a brand new invoice

Parameter.Name: currency
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The curreny code to make the invoice with.

Token.Abstract: Initialize the invoice with data received from the server in the past.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary The dictionary previously received from a GetInvoiceDetails API call.

Token.Abstract: Initialize the invoice with data received from the server in the past and reconcile its items with the given context.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary The dictionary previously received from a GetInvoiceDetails API call.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: NSManagedObjectContext The context to reconcile the invoice items with.

Token.Abstract: Initialize the invoice with data received from the server in the past give it the invoice ID specified and reconcile its items with the given context. You MUST use this initialization method if you have an invoice ID that you want to give to an invoice, otherwise the invoice will get a new one when saving for the first time.

Parameter.Name: representation
Parameter.Abstract: NSDictionary The dictionary previously received from a GetInvoiceDetails API call.

Parameter.Name: invoiceId
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The invoice ID previously received from the server that you want to give to this server.

Parameter.Name: context
Parameter.Abstract: NSManagedObjectContext The context to reconcile the invoice items with.

Token.Abstract: Initialize a simple invoice with one item and an amount.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: Item name or description

Parameter.Name: amount
Parameter.Abstract: The amount of the item

Token.Abstract: Create a new invoice using the data from this invoice. This copies everything except the data that defines it as a unique invoice to PayPal.
Compile the invoice's data to a format that is ready to save as an InvoiceType parameter to an API call.
Reloads an invoice's data using a dictionary previously received from the server.

Parameter.Name: dictionary
Parameter.Abstract: The NSDictionary as received from the server

Get the quantity of an item currently on the order.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: the item id for the item for which a quantity is desired

Token.Abstract: phoneNumber will be prefilled into the receipt options of the transaction, and cleared when we restart it. If set, it will take precedence over any phone number from the server
phoneNumber will be prefilled into the receipt options of the transaction, and cleared when we restart it. If set, it will take precedence over any phone number from the server
phoneNumber will be prefilled into the receipt options of the transaction, and cleared when we restart it. If set, it will take precedence over any phone number from the server
emailAddress will be prefilled into the receipt options of the transaction, and cleared when we restart it. If set, it will take precedence over any email from the server
emailAddress will be prefilled into the receipt options of the transaction, and cleared when we restart it. If set, it will take precedence over any email from the server

A note that can be used when marking as paid if no other is specified.
A note that can be used when marking as paid if no other is specified.
A note that can be used when marking as paid if no other is specified.
Fetches an invoice item that corresponds to an itemId with no detailId.

ReturnValue.Abstract: PPHInvoiceItem The invoice item that was found. If there was none nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Fetches an invoice item that corresponds to an itemId and detailId.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The itemId to find in the invoice.

Parameter.Name: detailId
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The detail id (usually identifying options or variations)

ReturnValue.Abstract: PPHInvoiceItem The invoice item that was found. If there was none nil is returned.

Token.Abstract: Creates an invoice item with the given parameters an returns a pointer to it.

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The itemId for the new invoice item. Must be unique to other invoice items which don't have any itemDetailId. You can use this to get a pointer to the item later using invoiceWithId if you don't call reconcileInContext. If the itemId is not unique this method will return nil. Also, if you pass in a nil itemId this method will also return nil.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The item name.

Parameter.Name: quantity
Parameter.Abstract: NSDecimalNumber The number of the items to put in the cart. This value must not be negative, if a negative quantity is passed in this method will return nil.

Parameter.Name: unitPrice
Parameter.Abstract: NSDecimalNumber The price of a single one of these items. This value must not be negative, if a negative unitPrice is passed in this method will return nil.

Parameter.Name: taxRate
Parameter.Abstract: NSDecimalNumber The tax to be applied to this item. This value must not be negative, if a negative taxRate is passed in this method will return nil.

Parameter.Name: taxRateName
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The name for the tax rate given to this item.

Token.Abstract: Creates an invoice item with the given parameters an returns a pointer to it. ONLY use this function if you want to make an item that is not bound to a SellableItem for some reason. If you add one of these such items to the invoice and later call reconcileInContext the item will be associated with a new SellableItem and the item's itemId will be set to that of the SellableItem, rendering the previous itemId useless for searching in the invoice.
Token.Declaration: - (PPHInvoiceItem *)addItemWithId:(NSString *)itemId detailId:(NSString *)detailId name:(NSString *)name quantity:(NSDecimalNumber *)quantity unitPrice:(NSDecimalNumber *)unitPrice taxRate:(NSDecimalNumber *)taxRate taxRateName:(NSString *)taxRateName

Parameter.Name: itemId
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The itemId for the new invoice item. Must be unique to other invoice items (including itemDetailId). You can use this to get a pointer to the item later using invoiceWithId if you don't call reconcileInContext.

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The item name.

Parameter.Name: quantity
Parameter.Abstract: NSDecimalNumber The number of the items to put in the cart.

Parameter.Name: unitPrice
Parameter.Abstract: NSDecimalNumber The price of a single one of these items.

Parameter.Name: taxRate
Parameter.Abstract: NSDecimalNumber The tax to be applied to this item.

Parameter.Name: taxRateName
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The name for the tax rate given to this item.

Parameter.Name: itemDetailId
Parameter.Abstract: NSString The "identifying details" for the item such as size, toppings, etc.

Token.Abstract: Adds the specified quantity to the specified InvoiceItem in the invoice, you may pass a negative quantity value to decrement the item. Calling increment on an InvoiceItem that does not exist in the invoice will cause the item to be added with the desired quantity.

Parameter.Name: item
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceItem The item to increment.

Parameter.Name: quantity
Parameter.Abstract: NSDecimalNumber The amount to increase the item's quantity by, this may be negative to remove items from the invoice.

Token.Abstract: Remove all items from the invoice
Enqueues a network action to synchronize the invoice with the server's representation of it.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceBasicCompletionHandler The block to invoke once the network response is processed, you can check the returned error to see if the request was successful.

Token.Abstract: Enqueues a network action to save the invoice.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceBasicCompletionHandler The block to invoke once the network response is processed, you can check the returned error to see if the request was successful.

Token.Abstract: Enqueues a network action to send the invoice. A save is performed if the invoice has changed.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceBasicCompletionHandler The block to invoke once the network response is processed, you can check the returned error to see if the request was successful.

Token.Abstract: Enqueues a network action to cancel the invoice.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceBasicCompletionHandler The block to invoke once the network response is processed, you can check the returned error to see if the request was successful.

Token.Abstract: Enqueues a network action to get refund details

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceBasicCompletionHandler The block to invoke once the network response is processed, you can check the returned error to see if the request was successful.

Token.Abstract: Enqueues a network action to delete the invoice.

Parameter.Name: completionHandler
Parameter.Abstract: PPHInvoiceBasicCompletionHandler The block to invoke once the network response is processed, you can check the returned error to see if the request was successful.
